data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Düzce, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Düzce, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Düzce, Turkey to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.section_summary: On average, 61 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Düzce, Turkey.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Düzce who will make disciples who make disciples.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Düzce words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Kabardian people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Kabardian people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Kabardian people is yours.
Father, you gave the church of Düzce, Turkey the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Düzce, Turkey to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, we pray that the state of Düzce be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

location.name: Düzce
